spans.text: Figure 1.1.1E: A typical summer synoptic weather chart of South Africa
Figure 1.1.1F shows a typical winter synoptic weather chart of South Africa.
The features of a winter synoptic weather chart to note are:
Cold fronts moving over the land
Dominant Kalahari high pressure over the land (look for a large high
South Indian high pressure and the South Atlantic high pressure are
closer to the land and further north
Generally low temperatures over the land

Figure 1.1.1E: A typical summer synoptic weather chart of South Africa
Winter synoptic weather chart
Figure 1.1.1F shows a typical winter synoptic weather chart of South Africa. 
The features of a winter synoptic weather chart to note are:
1. Cold fronts moving over the land
2. Dominant Kalahari high pressure over the land (look for a large high 
pressure cell over the land)
3. The date
4. South Indian high pressure and the South Atlantic high pressure are 
closer to the land and further north
5. Generally low temperatures over the land
